column1: | * Arrive 2 minutes before crossing, Depart 1 minute after                                                  |                                            |            |
| Pathing time must not be used between Dorchester West and Dorchester Junction because there are no signals |                                            |            |
| Up direction services departing between 0630 and 0900 Monday to Friday                                     |                                            |            |
| Down pass/depart towards Chessington South                                                                 | Up pass/arrive from Worcester Park         | 4*         |
| Up pass/arrive from Worcester Park                                                                         | Down pass/depart towards Chessington South | Same time* |
| * Conflicting point is Motspur Park Junction, 1 minute journey to/from Motspur Park                        |                                            |            |
